mapper.insert: insert into data_constellation (name, datetime, date, all, color, health, love, money, number, QFriend, summary, work, create_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{all,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{health,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{love,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{QFriend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{work,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update data_constellation set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, datetime = #{dateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=INTEGER}, all = #{all,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, health = #{health,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, love = #{love,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QFriend = #{QFriend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work = #{work,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, datetime, date, all, color, health, love, money, number, QFriend, summary, work, create_time from data_constellation where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, datetime, date, all, color, health, love, money, number, QFriend, summary, work, create_time from data_constellation
